item.title: Visualization of Pokemon game title play tendency by networkx
item.description: #Introduction Created by a Pokemon researcher, We will help you analyze the results of the Pokemon Uniqueness Questionnaire. This time, this article is about the case where the questionnaire respondents performed ``visualization of the play tendency of 18 Pokemon games’’ with networkx library. ↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓ Of the Pokemon researchers who helped ** Research article 1 about “Pokemon-likeness” ** https://pkmnheight.blogspot.com/2020/03/1.html ↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑↑ user↑↑↑↑↑↑ 18 works 1.‘Red/Green/Blue Red/Blue’ 2.‘Pikachu Yellow’ 3.‘Gold/Silver’ 4.‘Crystal Crystal’ 5.

item.title: Responding to Pokemon's wonderful message by using COTOHA▼
item.description: Welcome to the # COTOHA world! ▼ This kiji is squid Because I saw a secret ▼▼ Let's try It’s a lottery ▼▼ [Qiita x COTOHA API present project] Let’s do text analysis with COTOHA API! #What is Pokemon Nice Message ▼ It is a message display used on the screen of the famous game “Pokemon” (released from Pokemon)(TheimagebelowisPokemonredandgreen.Fromthegamescreen).The point is that we want to reproduce this (why do you want to do that?

item.title: Machine learning with Pokemon
item.description: ## Introduction The Pokemon Sword Shield was launched last month. By the way, have you ever played Pokemon? As anyone who has played Pokemon will know, Pokemon has the ability value which consists of HP, Kogeki, Bogyo, Tokukou, Tokubo, and Quickness. It can be said that the higher the ability value is, the stronger the Pokemon is. Ability score is calculated from three values: race value, individual value and effort value.

item.title: [Pokemon sword shield] I tried to visualize the basis of deep learning judgment by taking the Osanke classification as an example
item.description: #Introduction Do you guys play Pokemon? I bought it for the first time in 10 years ~~ I got it from Santa. Aiming to get serious, we plan to stay home and select carefully during the year-end and New Year holidays. I was wondering if AdventCalendar could do something with Pokemon news items, so I tried ** a method that shows the basis of judgment of deep learning model ** using Pokemon Okayama family classification as an example ** Saw.
